alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 21 at 12:42PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall now continues to be possible into this evening across northern Mohave County. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following area, Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Area creeks and streams are running high and could flood with more heavy rain. Renewed thunderstorm activity through this evening could result in flooding around Colorado City. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
